paper_abstract: We present a real-time algorithm for realistically deforming 3D human blood vessels, while automatically detecting and avoiding interference among a large number of blood vessels under deformation. Sweep surfaces are employed for this purpose. Using a dynamic bounding volume hierarchy, specially designed for sweep surfaces, we support collision detection and other related geometric computations in real time. Copyright (c) 2013 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: Realistic deformation of 3D human blood vessels
